explanation: [0-0] A Minecraft zombie stands on a snowy ground, with two black blocks visible in front of it. Behind it is a blocky mountain.

[0-10] The zombie breaks the glass in front of it with its hand. Then the screen moves to the left, a Minecraft villager breaks the wooden plank in front of it with its head. The screen continues to move, and a skeleton continuously breaks the stone slabs in front of it. Finally, there is a diamond wooden plank in front of Steve, but it cannot be broken, so he is pointed at and laughed at by the people behind him.
